trans-unit.source: StorSimple Manager service administration | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: StorSimple Manager service administration | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Learn how to manage your StorSimple device by using the StorSimple Manager service in the Azure Management Portal.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to manage your StorSimple device by using the StorSimple Manager service in the Azure Management Portal.

trans-unit.source: This article describes the StorSimple Manager service interface, including how to connect to it, the various options available, and links out to the specific workflows that can be performed via this UI.
trans-unit.target: This article describes the StorSimple Manager service interface, including how to connect to it, the various options available, and links out to the specific workflows that can be performed via this UI.

trans-unit.source: This guidance is applicable to both; the StorSimple physical and the virtual device.
trans-unit.target: This guidance is applicable to both; the StorSimple physical and the virtual device.

trans-unit.source: After reading this article, you will learn to:
trans-unit.target: After reading this article, you will learn to:

trans-unit.source: Administer your StorSimple device via the StorSimple Manager service
trans-unit.target: Administer your StorSimple device via the StorSimple Manager service

trans-unit.source: The StorSimple Manager service runs in Microsoft Azure and connects to multiple StorSimple devices.
trans-unit.target: The StorSimple Manager service runs in Microsoft Azure and connects to multiple StorSimple devices.

trans-unit.source: You use a central Microsoft Azure Management Portal running in a browser to manage these devices.
trans-unit.target: You use a central Microsoft Azure Management Portal running in a browser to manage these devices.

trans-unit.source: To connect to the StorSimple Manager service, do the following.
trans-unit.target: To connect to the StorSimple Manager service, do the following.

trans-unit.source: Using your Microsoft account credentials, log on to the Microsoft Azure Management Portal (located at the top-right of the pane).
trans-unit.target: Using your Microsoft account credentials, log on to the Microsoft Azure Management Portal (located at the top-right of the pane).

trans-unit.source: Scroll down the left navigation pane to access the StorSimple Manager service.
trans-unit.target: Scroll down the left navigation pane to access the StorSimple Manager service.

trans-unit.source: The navigational hierarchy for the StorSimple Manager service UI is shown in the following table.
trans-unit.target: The navigational hierarchy for the StorSimple Manager service UI is shown in the following table.

trans-unit.source: StorSimple Manager landing page takes you to the UI service-level pages applicable to all devices within a service.
trans-unit.target: StorSimple Manager landing page takes you to the UI service-level pages applicable to all devices within a service.

trans-unit.source: Devices page takes you to the device–level UI pages applicable to a specific device.
trans-unit.target: Devices page takes you to the device–level UI pages applicable to a specific device.

trans-unit.source: Volume Containers page takes you to the volume page that shows all the volumes associated with a device.
trans-unit.target: Volume Containers page takes you to the volume page that shows all the volumes associated with a device.

trans-unit.source: The following table shows a summary of all the common management tasks and complex workflows that can be performed within the StorSimple Manager service UI.
trans-unit.target: The following table shows a summary of all the common management tasks and complex workflows that can be performed within the StorSimple Manager service UI.

trans-unit.source: These tasks are organized based on the UI pages on which they are initiated.
trans-unit.target: These tasks are organized based on the UI pages on which they are initiated.

trans-unit.source: For more information about each workflow, click the appropriate procedure in the table.
trans-unit.target: For more information about each workflow, click the appropriate procedure in the table.

trans-unit.target: If you want to do this ...

trans-unit.target: Create a service</br>Delete a service</br>Get service registration key</br>Regenerate service registration key

trans-unit.source: Change the service data encryption key</br>View the operation logs
trans-unit.target: Change the service data encryption key</br>View the operation logs
